page.title: 01SOUTH- WEST NORWICH
page.content: { The area that we surveyed is split into two main sections.The centre of Norwich and the suburbs. We had to survey twelve square kilometres in all.Some of the main shopping streets are:{St.Stephens {Street,Theatre Street and Gentlemans {Walk}which is where the biggest open market in Britain is.Our area also includes the two landmarks of Norwich, the{Cathedral}and the{castle. } Two of the main industries in Norwich are{Colmans}and{Norwich Union}which owns much land in and around{St {Stephens Street.}Norwich's only railway and goods depot is in our area too. To the South is the residental area. There are about twenty schools here. {The River Wensum}runs through the city and there are roughly fifty churches.
